availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William S. Downey (Commonwealth's Attorney, Bourbon County)

body.p: Downey was the Commonwealth’s Attorney for Bourbon County. He owned 19 slaves in 1860.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, “William S Downey (unknown-1898),” Memorial #100639015, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=100639015 (accessed june 5, 2017); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clark, Winchester, p. 71; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Clark, Winchester, p. 31.
